channel.title: An object i wan't to be able to click 'like a bank'
channel.description:
Aight, so im adding a gambling game to my server. But im sa0 c0nfuzzed!. Ive added the code to Client.java, but i just don't know where to put the object to click on ?
The code is this
[code]if (objectID == ####) {//Replace the #### to the object id you want gamblechest(###);// just add any amount of money you want.... }[/code]
Im going to make it the CW Chest ? Good idea i think. Anyways if you can help thanks :D

item.title: An object i wan't to be able to click 'like a bank'
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

I’m not to sure I follow. I guess if you want to know where to put the chest then somewhere at the home area, if you need the id google 317 object list.

Read full topic

item.title: An object i wan't to be able to click 'like a bank'
item.dc:creator: @ravens ravens
item.description:
@ravens wrote:

just search for objectID in client.java until you find similiar cases, and add it under one of those.

Read full topic
